name: Flaming Fury: The Lion's Inferno
description:
Development.

Prototype!

Controls Menu:

Dpad Up & DownMove to Selection"A"Select

Controls In Game: 

Left AnalogMove"A"Jump"B"Dash

A 2D platformer action-adventure game. The game features a cute, cartoonish character wolf and the main objective of the game is to jump and run through different levels while avoiding obstacles such as wholes and enemies. Still in development.
